home.title: Rangga Danu Kusuma
home.subtitle: Full-stack Web Developer
home.bio: I build practical digital solutions — from APIs to full-stack apps — and love experimenting with design, automation, and web systems.

about.title: About Me
about.bio1Continue: passionate about building practical digital solutions that solve real-world problems.
about.bio2: My journey in web development started with school subject and has grown into a serious pursuit of crafting efficient, scalable applications. I enjoy the entire development process — from designing user interfaces to architecting backend systems.
about.bio3: When I'm not coding, I'm exploring new technologies, reading about system design, or working on automation projects that make life easier. I believe in continuous learning and sharing knowledge with the community.

backend.title: Backend Development
backend.description: Comfortable with Laravel backend development and building robust APIs.

cloud.title: Cloud Deployment
cloud.description: Deploy and manage applications using AWS Lightsail and Vercel.

automation.title: Automation
automation.description: Passionate about automating workflows and improving efficiency.

fullstack.title: Full-stack Development
fullstack.description: Building complete web solutions from frontend to backend.

bootcamp.title: Joined UBIG LKS Bootcamp
bootcamp.description: Completed an intensive full-stack web development bootcamp. I learned Laravel 11 & React 18

internship.title: Started Internship as Full-stack Web Developer
internship.description: Worked on Laravel and API development for eSchool SaaS Website.

webtech1st.title: Web Technology – 1st Place (Mojokerto)
webtech1st.description: Earned 1st place in Mojokerto's Web Technology competition — my first real recognition in web development.

webtechProvincial.title: Web Technology – Provincial Level (Jawa Timur)
webtechProvincial.description: Represented my city at the Jawa Timur provincial level and placed 5th among the best competitors across the region.

contact.title: Get In Touch

rantale.title: Rantale - Web Novel Platform
rantale.description: A platform for reading and publishing web novels, featuring user-friendly interfaces and powerful tools for authors.

cryptotip.title: CryptoTip - Crypto Donations
cryptotip.description: A decentralized tipping platform that allows users to send and receive crypto donations directly via MetaMask. (Dashboard for tracking donors and amounts - coming soon!)
